description: Deploy and manage containerized applications with a fully managed Kubernetes. This connector facilitates the automated operations related to managed cluster.
name: azure-kubernetes-services
label: Azure Kubernetes Services

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: resource
fields.description: The service-based URI to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.description: Unique API ID of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.description: Unique API Secret of the Azure Active Directory application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API. For information on how to get the secret key, see 'https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/microsoft-defender-atp/exposed-apis-create-app-webapp'.

fields.title: Tenant ID
fields.name: tenant_id
fields.description: ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

fields.title: Authorization Code
fields.name: code
fields.tooltip: Authorization code that you acquired in the authorization step.
fields.description: (Only Applicable to On behalf of User – Delegate Permission) The authorization code that you acquired during the authorization step. For more information, see the Getting Access Tokens using the Delegate Permissions method section.

fields.title: Redirect URL
fields.description: The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. It must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you registered in the app registration portal.
fields.name: redirect_url
fields.tooltip: (Only Applicable to On behalf of User – Delegate Permission) The redirect_uri of your app, where authentication responses can be sent and received by your app. The redirect URL that you specify here must exactly match one of the redirect_uri's you have registered in your app registration portal.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Managed Cluster
operations.description: Creates a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services, based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to creates a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to create a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the managed cluster resource from which you want to create a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource.

parameters.title: Resource Location
parameters.description: Location of the resource from which you want to create a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: location

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to create managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to create managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.

operations.title: List Managed Clusters
operations.description: Retrieves the list of managed clusters from Azure Kubernetes Services based on the subscription ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the managed clusters from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

operations.title: Get Managed Cluster
operations.description: Retrieves information for a specific managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services, based on the resource name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve the managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve the managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the managed cluster resource from which you want to retrieve the managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource

operations.title: Update Managed Cluster
operations.description: Updates a existing managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services, based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to update a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to update a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the managed cluster resource from which you want to update a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource

parameters.title: Resource Location
parameters.description: Location of the resource from which you want to update a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: location

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to update a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to update a managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.

operations.title: Delete Managed Cluster
operations.description: Deletes a specific managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services, based on the resource name and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to delete the managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to delete the managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the managed cluster resource from which you want to delete the managed cluster from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource

operations.title: Managed Cluster Actions
operations.description: Performs actions such as start, stop, or rotate certificate on specified managed cluster on your Azure Kubernetes Services, based on the cluster action and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Action to Process the cluster
parameters.description: Select the action that you want to perform on the specified managed cluster on the Azure Kubernetes Services. You can choose from the following options: Start Managed Cluster, Stop Managed Cluster, or Rotate Cluster Certificates.
parameters.name: action

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to perform action on the managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to perform action on the managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the managed cluster resource from which you want to perform action on the managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource

operations.title: Run Command
operations.description: Retrieves an information associated with a specific command from Azure Kubernetes Services based on the command and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the resource from which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource

parameters.title: Command
parameters.description: Command based on which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: command
parameters.tooltip: Command based on which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.description: (Optional) Additional fields that you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.

operations.title: Get Command Details
operations.description: Retrieves information of a command which has been run on the managed cluster in Azure Kubernetes Services, based on the command ID and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Command ID
parameters.description: ID of the command that you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: commandId

parameters.title: Workspace Resource Group
parameters.description: Azure active directory resource group from which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.title: Workspace Subscription ID
parameters.description: Azure active directory subscription ID from which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.title: Resource Name
parameters.description: Name of the resource from which you want to retrieve details from Azure Kubernetes Services.
parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the managed cluster resource
